colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @012A *, ,(CES PA 'DI YANG DANG STOBS DANG LDANG ZHING LUGS GNYIS LA MKHYEN PA'I SPYAN LDAN BYAMS PA BKRA SHIS GUNG GI BKAS BSKUL BA'I NGOR DZA YA PAndI TA BLO BZANG 'PHRIN LAS KYIS SBYAR BA 'DIS KYANG RGYAL BA GNYIS PA'I BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,SARBA MANGGA LAm, ,BKRA SHIS 'BAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
